animeTitle: Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: Hyoutei vs. Rikkai - Game of Future
otherNames: The New Prince of Tennis: Hyoutei vs. Rikkai - Game of Future, 新テニスの王子様 氷帝 vs 立海 Game of Future
synopsis: The new anime will tell an original story, featuring a match between the Hyoutei Academy Secondary Department led by Keigo Atobe and Rikkai University-Affiliated Middle School led by Seiichi Yukimura. The story was previously not depicted in the manga.
